html: Some notes on employment stats... - 4.3% unemployment doesn’t only count people in receipt of benefits - Recent jobs growth has been dominated by full-time roles - Under 3% of people rely on a zero-hours contract (@ avg 25 hrs/wk) - There are over 3/4m vacancies
text:
Some notes on employment stats...
- 4.3% unemployment doesn’t only count people in receipt of benefits
- Recent jobs growth has been dominated by full-time roles
- Under 3% of people rely on a zero-hours contract (@ avg 25 hrs/wk)
- There are over 3/4m vacancies
